peters_algorithm.base.asset_placement.border_placer module¶

class peters_algorithm.base.asset_placement.border_placer.BorderPlacer[source]¶

Bases: AbstractPlacer

Places borders into the given environment.

_abc_impl = <_abc._abc_data object>¶
add(environment: Environment, mujoco_object_blueprint: MujocoObject, amount: int = 4, has_border: bool = False)[source]¶

Adds the borders around the environment

Parameters:

  • environment (Environment) – Environment class instance

  • mujoco_object_blueprint (MujocoObject) – Blueprint of to-be-placed mujoco object

  • amount (int) – Number of to-be-placed borders

  • has_border (bool) – True if border is added to environment, else False

Returns:

An empty environment with borders around it

Return type:

mjcf_model (mjcf)

remove(*, site: AbstractContainer, mujoco_object: MujocoObject)[source]¶

Remove function, currently not implemented/needed
